style.name: Divider Style
style.comment: The size of the divider interface

title.name: Divider Title
title.comment: The title or headline of the divider interface

description.name: Divider Description
description.comment: The description of the divider interface to display always, accepts basic markdown

endpoint.name: Divider Endpoint
endpoint.comment: The endpoint to get the content to load into the overlay component

button.name: Divider Call To Action
button.comment: The text of the button that will call the endpoint

hr.name: Horizontal Line
hr.comment: Option to display a horizontal line below the title of the divider interface

margin.name: Vertical Margin
margin.comment: Option to display an extra margin above the divider interface
